body:
Comment 1: 
That error is coming from GCC, which is being used to build 8l.  Is that really all you
see?  I would expect to see an error message from ld.  All I see here is that ld is
failing, but why?  And the exit status of 5 is odd--as far as I know the GNU linker
never exits with a status other than 0 or 1.

The dist tool is showing you the exact command that failed--what happens if you run that
command yourself?
